blockword.correcto: Open the following file to view the list of blocked words.
blockword.doc2: In the [documentation](https://docs.discordsafe.com/docs/config/blockedwords) you can see our configuration guide.
blockword.embedDes: This feature allows you to block words.
blockword.embedField2: If you need help check out our [configuration guide](https://docs.discordsafe.com/docs/config/blockedwords) or ask on our [support server](https://discordsafe.com/discord).
blockword.embedField4:
`blockword add` - Add one or more words.
`blockword remove` - Removes one or several words.
`blockword add pack` - Blocks a group of preselected words.
`blockword remove pack` - Unblock a group of preselected words.
`blockword list` - Displays the list of blocked words on the server.
`blockword ignore [#Channel/@Role]` - Ignores a channel or role from the blocked words.
`blockword reset` - Removes all words.
blockword.errorNoArgs: **Error**, you have to add an argument.
blockword.ignoreErrorArg: **Error**, you must mention the channel or role you want to ignore.
blockword.ninguna: All words have been successfully unlocked.
blockword.packsDescription:
Blocked word packs save time and directly block the most common offensive words.

- **Block a pack with:** `{prefix}}{{commandName}} add pack <Number>`
- **Unlock a pack with:** `{prefix}}{{commandName}} remove pack <Number>`.
blockword.packsField2:
`en` - Offensive words in __English__.
`es` - Offensive words in __Spanish__
`lgbt` - Insults to the lgbt community.
`nsfw` - Explicitly offensive words.
`racists` - Racist insults.
`pacman` - Pacmans (`:v`).
blockword.palabrasReseteadasExito: All words have been successfully unlocked.
blockword.unIgnoreCh: The channel <#{{channel}}> has __no longer been ignored__ sucessfully.
blockword.unIgnoreRl: The role <@&{{role}}> has been __no longer ignored__ sucessfully.

cases.noWarn: There it isn't any moderation case in the server.
cases.desc: Select the order that you want the cases to be shown
cases.fieldd:
{{emojione}} Ascendant (Older first)
{{emojitwo}} Descendant (Newer first)
{{emojicancel}} Cancels the command

commands.doc2: Check my [documentation](https://docs.discordsafe.com/) to see my configuration guide.
commands.title: Commands list
commands.description:
**Prefix:** `{{prefix}}`
**Type `{{prefix}}help [command]` to get all the information about a command.**

deafen.errorConectado: **Error**, the member is not connected to a voice channel.
deafen.errorMenci√≥n: **Error**: The user has not been mentioned.
deafen.errorYaEnsordecido: **Error**, that user is already deafened, use `d.undeafen` to undeafen it.
deafen.reason: You have been deafened in **{{guild}}** for: **{{reason}}**.

filter.ayudaDes:
Filters allow you to protect your server to **prevent malicious content** and keep your channels clean.

**Enable:** `{{prefix}}{{commandName}} [filter] enable`.
**Disable:** `{{prefix}}{{commandName}} [filter] disable`.
**Ignore:** `{{prefix}}{{commandName}} [filter] ignore [#Channel/@Role]`.
filter.comandosBlockedWord:
‚Ä¢ Block one or many words: `{{prefix}}blockword add [word] <word>`
‚Ä¢ Unblock one or many words: `{{prefix}}blockword remove [word] <word>`
‚Ä¢ Ignore a channel or role: `{{prefix}}blockword ignore [#Channel/@Role]`
‚Ä¢ [More information](https://docs.discordsafe.com/docs/config/blockedwords).
filter.comandosDefault:
‚Ä¢ Enable: `{{prefix}}{{commandName}} {{filter}} enable`.
‚Ä¢ Disable: `{{prefix}}{{commandName}} {{filter}} disable`.
‚Ä¢ Ignore channels/roles: `{{prefix}}{{commandName}} {{filter}} ignore [#Channel/@Role]`.
filter.doc3: Access a **filter configuration guide** in the [documentation] (https://docs.discordsafe.com/docs/config/filters).
filter.fim√°genes:
**This filter is premium**, more information `{{prefix}} premium`.
It scans images submitted outside NSFW channels and deletes them if it detects that they are not suitable for all audiences and contain explicit content.
filter.finvitaciones: Deletes the invitations of Discord servers sent by members without permissions.
filter.fiploggers:
Delete links containing iploggers, to improve the security of your server.

{{premium}} **Get the advanced filter** which blocks __+800 iploggers__, more information `{{prefix}}}premium`.
filter.fmalicioso: Analyzes the messages and links and if it detects that it is spam, it will delete it.
filter.fpalabras: Blocked words filter, to add use `{{prefix}}blockword <word>`.
filter.ignoreCh: The channel <#{{channel}}> has been __ignored__ of the **{{filter}}** filter.
filter.ignoreRl: The role <@&{{role}}> has been __ignored__ from the **{{filter}}** filter.
filter.levelDes: Set the level of the **anti-spam filter** in your server with `{{prefix}}{{commandName}} anti-spam enable <Level number>
filter.levelLevels:
You can set the anti-spam level by adding the level to the command, example: `{{prefix}}{{commandName}} anti-spam enable 2`.
{{emoji1}} **Level 1**, blocks a message with a lot of capital letters or spam.
{{emoji2}} **Level 2**, blocks duplicated messages, capital letters and spam.
{{emoji3}} **Level 3**, blocks duplicated messages, capital letters, copypasta and spam.
filter.noArgsDes:
The filters let you protect your server to **prevent malicious content from being sent** and that your channels be a clean place
**To know how to configure it use:** `{{prefix}}filter help`
filter.unIgnoreCh: The channel <#{{channel}}> has been __no longer ignored__ on the **{{filter}}** filter.
filter.unIgnoreRl: The role <@&{{role}}> has been __no longer ignored__ on the **{{filter}}** filter.

help.descripci√≥n:
Hi, I'm **D-Safe**, a bot dedicated to moderation, utility and security, created to solve all your server problems.

I've been **{{tiempo}}** online helping **{{servidores}}** servers with **{{comandos}}** commands.
My prefix on this server is `{{prefix}}`, to see my commands use `{{prefix}}commands`.
help.embedFeature1d: We have released the 5.0 update focused on completely improving moderation. See the [changelog](https://blog.discordsafe.com/).
help.embedFeature2d: [Vote me for support](https://top.gg/bot/461171501715161108/vote) while you get improvements with [D-Safe Premium](https://discordsafe.com/premium), check out our [Discord server](https://discordsafe.com/discord).
help.embedFeature4d: If you find a bad translation, please report it to [the support server](https://discordsafe.com/discord).
help.embedFeedbackFormd: Opinion and first impressions of new users are important to enhance my development, complete this anonymus [form](https://discordsafe.com/encuesta) in 1 minute, I appreciate it a lot. <3
help.embedFeedbackFormt: {{safeform}} ‚îÅ Give us your opinion in 1 minute!
help.embedMaild: You can read my update changelog, use `{{prefix}}mail` to read it.
help.embedSuggestion2: You can set my prefix with `{{prefix}}setprefix`.
help.embedSuggestion3: You can specify from whom you want to delete messages with `{{prefix}}clear @User`.
help.embedSuggestion4: You can configure me in less than 15 seconds just using the `{{prefix}}setup` command.
help.embedSuggestion1: You can ban multiple users with `{{prefix}}hackban`.
help.embedSuggestion5: I have a bunch of slash commands, look at them by typing a **/**.

help.description: Register all the activity of your server with the logs.

field1.d: If you need help, check our [configuration](https://docs.discordsafe.com/docs/config/logs) guide or ask in our [server](https://discordsafe.com/discord).

field2.d:
`logs help` - Shows this help menu.
`logs list` - Shows the list of the configured log modules.
`logs [#Channel/ChannelID/disable]` - Sets server‚Äôs main activity logs.
`logs mod [#Channel/ChannelID/disable]` - Sets moderation actions logs.
`logs boost [#Channel/ChannelID/disable]` - Sets boosts and server upgrades logs.

help.title: D-Safe Premium
help.field1d:
‚Ä¢ Advanced IPlogger filter.
‚Ä¢ NSFW images filter.
‚Ä¢ Automatic forceban.
‚Ä¢ Suggestion manager role.
‚Ä¢ Custom color palette.
‚Ä¢ Suggestions-only channel.
‚Ä¢ Cooldown within suggestions.
‚Ä¢ Customized emojis in the reactions.
‚Ä¢ Lower response time.
‚Ä¢ Server boost logs.
‚Ä¢ Special badge.
‚Ä¢ Prioritary support.
‚Ä¢ Exclusive roles and channels.
‚Ä¢ Be part of the Testers program.
help.desc: Enhance your community with D-Safe Premium and support the development of the bot to bring better updates and features you expect.

safer.author: Congratulations! You have obtained D-Safe Premium
safer.desc: Now you will be able to redeem this benefit on a server using `/{{commandName}} redeem` inside the server where you want to redeem it.

suggestions.embedCommands1:
`suggest`
`suggestions help`
`suggestions list`
`suggestions approve [Suggestion ID] <Comment>`
`suggestions deny [Suggestion ID] <Comment>`
`suggestions delete [Suggestion ID]`
`suggestions setchannel [Channel ID/#Channel]`
`suggestions setapproved [Channel ID/#Channel]`
`suggestions setdenied [Channel ID/#Channel]`
`suggestions questionEmoji enable / disable`
`suggestions autoaccept [Number(1-1000)] / disable`
`suggestions massapprove [Suggestion ID]...`
`suggestions massdeny [Suggestion ID]...`
`suggestions massdelete [Suggestion ID]...`
`suggestions setrole [Role ID/@Role]`
`suggestions setpalette ayu / tailwind / default / p1 / p2 / p3 / n1 / n2 / n3`
`suggestions setcommandschannel [Channel ID/#Channel]`
`suggestions setcooldown [Number(1-60)] / disable`
`suggestions setemoji [Positive Emoji] [Negative Emoji] <Undecided Emoji> / disable`

suggestions.fancyEmbedDescription:
Set the suggestions color palette.
Use `{{prefix}}suggestions setpalette <Theme>` to set the color palette.
suggestions.fancyEmbedField2D:
Requires [D-Safe Premium](https://discordsafe.com/premium).
`{{commandName}} p1` Sets the positive color for few votes.
`{{commandName}} p2` Sets the positive color for the mid of votes.
`{{commandName}} p3` Sets the positive color for many votes.
`{{commandName}} n1` Sets the negative color for few votes.
`{{commandName}} n2` Sets the negative color for the mid of votes.
`{{commandName}} n3` Sets the negative color for many votes.

verification.desactivarField: To disable the verification use `d.verification disable`.
verification.descripci√≥nAyuda: Set the verification in your server with one of our powerful modes to avoid conflicting users, multi-accounts or spam bots.
verification.doc2: All the **guide to verify** is better explained here **[documentaci√≥n](https://docs.discordsafe.com/docs/config/lang)**.
verification.errorMensaje: The command must be used in {{channel}}, on the same channel as the message you wish to set.
verification.errorMensajeCanal:
**Error:** You need to indicate a channel first.
**Help:** `d.verification help`
verification.errorMensajeModo:
**Error:** This option is only necessary if you use the mode __{{mode}}__.
**Help:** `d.verification help`
verification.errorMensajePermisos: The bot needs permissions of modify messages.
verification.errorModoPrimero:
**Error:** You need to select the mode first.

verification.errorNoCanalEstablecido: Please first configure the channel again.
verification.errorNoRow: You can't disable something that hasn't been enabled.
verification.establecidoCaptcha: The mode has been established to `captcha`
verification.establecidoIntentos: The maximum number of verification attempts has been set to **{{intentos}} attempts **.
verification.establecidoMensaje: The message has been established to
verification.establecidoMinutos: Verification minutes have been set to **{{minutos}} minutes**.
verification.establecidoRol: The rol has been established to
verification.establecidoTiempo: The minimum account time for new users have been set to **{{age}}** days.
verification.importanteField:
If something goes wrong, remember to check the accents and misspellings.
The commands must be put without the `<>`.
[Don't know how to copy an ID?](Https://docs.discordsafe.com/docs/guide/copy-ids).
If you have questions, ask them on [the support server](https://discordsafe.com/discord).
verification.mensajeField:
**This is only necessary for the mode __reaction__** where the message is the message that the users will need to react.
To use it use `d.verification setmessage MessageID`
verification.noArgsDescripci√≥n: Set the verification in your server with one of our powerful modes to avoid conflicting users, multi-accounts or spam bots.
verification.noArgsFooter: To know how to configurate use d.verification help

whitelist.quitado: The user {{user}} has been eliminated from the whitelist.

verification.channelDesc:
**This will be the verification channel.**
Select a text channel in the next select menu.
verification.noverifiedDesc:
**This will be the role given to the new users when they join the server before being verified.**
Select a role in the next select menu.
verification.msgDesc:
**Set the message that the guests will have to react to when joining your server. Important, the message that you are setting needs to be in the channel that you configured previously.**
You have to send a message ID. [How to copy an ID?](https://docs.discordsafe.com/docs/ayuda/copiar-ids)
verification.userDesc:
**This will be the role given to the new users when they are verified.**
Select a role in the next select menu.
verification.ageDesc:
**Set the maximum of days that accounts need to have when they join your server, with this you avoid the join of alts or spam self-bots.**
Select an option in the select menu or send a number, press {{cancelEmoji}} to cancel and leave it by default.
verification.tryDesc:
**Optionally you can set the attempts max that you can do with the captcha**
Press {{cancelEmoji}} to cancel it and leave it by default.
verification.minDesc:
**Optionally you can set the minutes max to wait for a user to complete the captcha.**
Press {{cancelEmoji}} to cancel it and leave it by default.
verification.doneDesc:
You have completed the **verification** setup successfully.
You can use `{{prefix}}verification` to view the actual settings.

filters.spamLevel_desc:
{{emoji1}} **Level 1**, prohibits a message with lots of caps or spam.
{{emoji2}} **Level 2**, prohibits duplicated messages, caps and spam.
{{emoji3}} **Level 3**, prohibits all the duplicated messages, caps, copypastas and spam.
filters.inviteFilter_desc: Blocks the invites to another Discord servers.
filters.iploggersFilter_desc: Deletes the links that contain an iplogger, iploggers are websites that track the user's information.
filters.spamFilter_desc: Blocks messages with lots of caps, duplicated words and copypastas.
filters.imagesFilter_desc: Blocks the images detected as explicit out of NSFW channels.
filters.doneDesc: You have completed the **filters** setup successfully.

moderation.notifyUsers: Notify the target when it is punished
moderation.notifyUsers_footer: This option can be overwritten by adding `--md` at the end of the command.
moderation.deleteCmds: Delete messages after using moderation commands
moderation.deleteCmds_footer: This option can be overwritten by adding `--del` at the end of the command.
moderation.doneDesc: You have successfully completed the **moderation** setup.
moderation.replyWithReason_footer: This option can be overwritten by adding `--reason` at the end of the command.

setup.cancelDesc: Cancels the selection and sets the default.
